alldb.table_sql: SELECT WII.JBPM4_DEPLOYMENT_DBID_ AS DEPLOYID, WII.WORKFLOW_NAME_ AS WORKFLOWNAME, HP.ID_ AS PROCESSINSTANCEID, HP.DBID_ AS PROCESSINSTANCEDBID, TO_CHAR(HP.START_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS PROCESSSTART, WIU.ID_ AS ACTORID, HAC.HTASK_ AS TASKID, TJAD.ACTIVITY_NAME_ AS TASKNAME, WIU.TASKTYPE AS TASKTYPE, TO_CHAR(HAC.START_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS TASKSTART, NVL(WII.KEY_THREE_,WII.KEY_ONE_) AS SERIALNO, WII.KEY_TWO_ AS PROJECTNAME, WII.KEY_THREE_ AS CONTRACTID FROM( --待办任务和任务指派 SELECT ID_, JBPMWORKFLOWHISTORYINFO_ID_, CASE WHEN ASSIGN_ACTOR_USER_ID_ IS NOT NULL AND ASSIGNED_ACTOR_USER_ID_ IS NULL THEN 'assignmentPending' WHEN ASSIGN_ACTOR_USER_ID_ IS NOT NULL AND ASSIGNED_ACTOR_USER_ID_ IS NOT NULL THEN 'assignmentCompleted' ELSE 'pending' END AS TASKTYPE FROM T_JBPM_WORKFLOW_INFOS_USERS WHERE END_TIME_ IS NULL /~USERID: AND PLAN_ACTOR_USER_ID_ = '{USERID}' ~/ /~PENDING: --委托任务 UNION ALL SELECT JIU.ID_, JIU.JBPMWORKFLOWHISTORYINFO_ID_, 'delegate' AS TASKTYPE FROM( SELECT GRANT_USER_ID_, DEPLOYMENT_ID_ FROM T_JBPM_GRANT_DELEGATE_USERS WHERE START_DATE_ <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND END_DATE_ >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') /~USERID: AND DELEGATE_USER_ID_ = '{USERID}' ~/ )GDU INNER JOIN( SELECT ID_, PLAN_ACTOR_USER_ID_, JBPMWORKFLOWHISTORYINFO_ID_, JBPM4_DEPLOYMENT_DBID_ FROM T_JBPM_WORKFLOW_INFOS_USERS WHERE END_TIME_ IS NULL /~USERID: AND PLAN_ACTOR_USER_ID_ != '{USERID}' ~/ )JIU ON JIU.PLAN_ACTOR_USER_ID_ = GDU.GRANT_USER_ID_ AND GDU.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ = JIU.JBPM4_DEPLOYMENT_DBID_ --会签任务 UNION ALL SELECT ID_, JBPMWORKFLOWHISTORYINFO_ID_, 'signature' FROM T_JBPM_SIGNATURE_USERS WHERE END_TIME_ IS NULL /~USERID: AND SIGNATURED_ACTOR_USER_ID_ = '{USERID}' ~/ --传阅任务 UNION ALL SELECT ID_, JBPMWORKFLOWHISTORYINFO_ID_, 'read' FROM T_JBPM_READ_USERS WHERE END_TIME_ IS NULL /~USERID: AND READED_ACTOR_USER_ID_ = '{USERID}' ~/ ~/ )WIU INNER JOIN( SELECT ID_,KEY_ONE_,KEY_TWO_,KEY_THREE_,KEY_FOUR_,KEY_FIVE_,KEY_SIX_,KEY_SEVEN_, KEY_EIGHT_,KEY_NINE_,KEY_TEN_,PROCESS_FORM_PATH_,PROCESS_FORM_TITLE_, WORKFLOW_NAME_,WORKFLOW_DISPLAY_NAME_,DRAFT_UUID_,PROCESSINSTANCE_STATE_, PROCESSDEFINITION_ID_,REQUEST_INITIATOR_,REQUEST_INITIATOR_REAL_NAME_, FROM_BUTTONTEXT_TO_COME_,JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST_DBID_,PREV_JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST_DBID_, JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST_DBID_,JBPM4_DEPLOYMENT_DBID_, REQUEST_INITIATOR_ID_,ACTIVITY_DETAIL_ID_,JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST_LAST_DBID_ FROM T_JBPM_WORKFLOW_INFO WHERE JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST_DBID_ IS NOT NULL /~NOTPROCESSINSTANCESTATE: AND PROCESSINSTANCE_STATE_!='{NOTPROCESSINSTANCESTATE}' ~/ /~PROCESSINSTANCESTATE: AND PROCESSINSTANCE_STATE_='{PROCESSINSTANCESTATE}' ~/ )WII ON WII.ID_ = WIU.JBPMWORKFLOWHISTORYINFO_ID_ LEFT JOIN T_JBPM_ACTIVITY_DETAIL TJAD ON TJAD.ID_ = WII.ACTIVITY_DETAIL_ID_ LEFT JOIN /*( SELECT DBID_, CLASS_, DBVERSION_, HPROCI_, TYPE_, EXECUTION_, ACTIVITY_NAME_, START_, END_, DURATION_, TRANSITION_, NEXTIDX_, HTASK_, PROCI_HISTORY_INFO_ID_, ACTIVED_PROCI_HISTORY_INFO_ID_, TASK_HISTORY_INFO_ID_, FIRSTED_HISTORY_INFO_ID_ FROM JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST )*/ JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST HAC ON HAC.DBID_ = WII.JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST_DBID_ LEFT JOIN( SELECT DBID_, DBVERSION_, ID_, PROCDEFID_, KEY_, START_, END_, DURATION_, STATE_, ENDACTIVITY_, NEXTIDX_ FROM JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST )HP ON HAC.HPROCI_ = HP.DBID_ WHERE (HAC.END_ IS NULL OR WIU.TASKTYPE='read' OR WIU.TASKTYPE='signature') /~globalQueryText: AND( UPPER(HAC.ACTIVITY_NAME_) LIKE '%{globalQueryText}%' OR UPPER(WII.WORKFLOW_NAME_) LIKE '%{globalQueryText}%' OR UPPER(WII.KEY_ONE_ ) LIKE '%{globalQueryText}%' OR UPPER(WII.KEY_TWO_ ) LIKE '%{globalQueryText}%' OR UPPER(WII.KEY_THREE_ ) LIKE '%{globalQueryText}%' ) ~/ ORDER BY HAC.START_ DESC
